body: * fixed drm content for restart (license server error 500)

* Added livestream specials for the htmlscraper (#121)
* Fixed Lic Server Error (Livestreams)

* removed quality setting
* fixed livestream listing (html scraper)
* fixed restart for kodi < 19

- service api auth fix
- service api restart fix

restart is broken on 0.12.3 for kodi 18 users. use 0.12.3-1 instead!

- UHD livestream support (matrix)
- DRM archive video support (htmlscraper/matrix)
- DRM Restart
- fixed broken livestream caused by drm changes (see #105)
- better quality selection

use plugin.video.orftvthek-0.12.2.zip for kodi < 19

name: 0.12.0+matrix.1
body: Added DRM Livestream Support for KODI Matrix
for kodi versions prior to matrix (<19)
* Fixed Livestream issues caused by special news shows (Bundesland Spezial)

* optimized live stream option for serviceapi (Issue #83)
* removed scheduled livestream because it results in an endless loop of dialog boxes (serviceapi)

- fixed htmlscraper (new orf tvthek website structure)
- "Im Fokus" added for the htmlscraper
- "TV Programm" added for the htmlscraper
- New icons/backdrops according to the new CI

* Added UHD Livestream Option
* Added Adaptive Quality Setting
* Fixed #66 "Play All" Listitem Kodi crashes
* Fixed Bundesland Heute Livestream Options for the htmlscraper
fixed 403 errors caused by uncommon UA
